actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to allow projects conducted under the Rio Grande Bank Protection Project to be undertaken in Starr County, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes bank protection activities along the Rio Grande River in Starr County, Texas in accordance with: (1) specifications established by the U.S.-Mexico International Boundary and Water Commission; and (2) conditions generally applicable to the Rio Grande bank protection project.

titles.title: A bill to allow projects conducted under the Rio Grande Bank Protection Project to be undertaken in Starr County, Texas.
